APAC Region
Johnson Matthey, a FTSE 100 company, is a global leader in sustainable technologies specialising in catalysis, precious metal products, chemicals and process technology. With operations in over 30 countries, we employ more than 13,000 people. Johnson Matthey uses science to make the world cleaner and healthier. Over the past two centuries we have built our reputation and place as a global leader through quality, integrity, and innovation. Today, more than 93% of the group's sales come from products and services which provide sustainability benefits through the positive impact they have on the environment, resource efficiency and human health, but that’s not enough. We have ambitious plans for growth and need talented individuals to help shape and lead us into our next century.
We are looking for an experience Sales Manager to join our Catalyst Technologies sector. You will be responsible for managing the sales process for your direct sales account customers across the APAC (excluding China) region.  You will contribute to our Hydrogen business by driving overall financial performance for the region. This includes continued growth and profitability consistent with our strategy while building and maintaining effective relationships with your customers and stakeholders (both internal and external) in an ethical and safe manner.
Key responsibilities
Implement and drive the regional strategy that is consistent with the business growth and profitability requirements in a safe and ethical manner.
Manage the sales process for customers mainly focusing on Thailand from pre-qualification through negotiation to closing profitable sales deals. This may include professional delivery of all proposal documents and tender responses for some allocated customers. As and when new initiatives and innovations are introduced, these must be incorporated within the proposal/tender response (if appropriate).
Deliver sales, gross profit margin, and customer contribution for the sales territory.  This includes delivering new business opportunities and new projects in the region through collaboration with other team members, including China team.
Building and maintaining effective relationships with customers and stakeholders which create value and build transformational long-term partnerships
Deliver effective customer management through the implementation of robust database and reporting systems (eg CRM) by ensuring that data is accurately entered and managed within the company's CRM or other sales management system with accurate sales forecasts provided.
Providing technical and product advice to customers on suitable products which will drive their project and investment plans and improve their production assets bringing value to JM and customers
Champion new product and/or services from innovation through to successful implementation to maximize business success.
Coordinate and collaborate with Technical Service team to ensure superior product performance for customers
Share customer and market insights with relevant Catalyst Technology team to anticipate market requirements, improving JM offer and solutions
Collaborate with supporting functions, such as TPI manager and Insides Sales representative, to support customers and deliver business growth targets in the region.
Champion change and role model the behaviours for continuous business improvement and success.
Ensuring all activities are undertaken in accordance with JM code of ethics and EHS policy and practices
Are you the ideal candidate?
You will have/be:
Experienced sales professional, you will have proven technical sales experience including complex negotiations.
Educated to degree level, or equivalent, within a scientific or technical discipline.
Expertise setting up and managing sales channels and processes.
An established background in hydrogen production units.
